verbose_text: Spearman 's rank correlation analysis revealed that the mRNA expression of ATF3 and MMP2 positively correlated with the pathological grade of glioma (rho = 0.621, P < 0.01 and rho = 0.503, P < 0.01, respectively), while the mRNA expression of maspin negatively correlated with the pathological grade of glioma (rho = -0.415, P < 0.01).
